snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday’s selections include a look at making a new language out of pictures (it would be very complicated), and a look back at a world...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday’s selections include a look at making a new language out of pictures (it would be very complicated), and a look back at a world where print magazines displayed the wonders of new computer technology.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Memories of a Computer Shopper World, and Picture Language
